readable.title: 3285214689_f0219e9671
readable.content: A basketball player jumps to make the shot while another tries to stop him . Man in blue sport uniform with basketball in right hand attempting to score basket while being blocked by player in white uniform . The basketball player in white is defending the basket against the player wearing blue . Two basketball players oppose each other at the net . Two men are playing basketball and one is trying to block the others shot .
